Are you ready to take your DIY projects to the next level? Look no further than the 18" x 21" Dots on Pink Quilt Cotton Fabric Quarter by Keepsake Calico. Constructed with 100% cotton, this fabric quarter is soft to the touch and easy to work with. The imported fabric maintains the same quality and thermal properties as yardage options, so you can be confident in your finished product. Plus, it's machine washable, making it convenient to clean and maintain.

data.name: 18" x 21" Apple Pies on Black Fall Cotton Fabric Quarter 1pc
data.description:
Get Ready for Fall with 18" x 21" Apple Pies on Black Cotton Fabric Quarter 1pc

Bring the warmth of the season into your home with this beautiful Apple Pies on Black Fall Cotton Fabric Quarter. Perfect for quilting, crafting, and creating festive fall decor, this fabric is sure to inspire your creativity. The rich colors and intricate design of this fabric will add a touch of autumn charm to any project.

Measuring 18" x 21" inches, this fabric is easy to work with and care for. Simply machine wash normal cold with mild detergent, tumble dry, and warm iron as needed. With proper care, this fabric will last for years to come.

Product Details

  • Dimensions: 18" x 21" inches
  • Care Instructions: Machine Wash Normal Cold, Mild Detergent, No Bleach, Tumble Dry, Warm Iron
  • Best Used For: Quilts, Crafts, Fall Decor, Fabric Pumpkins
